recommendations: Abhishek Sharma “Working with Pawan was empowering. Despite his achievements and intelligence, his humility and attitude towards life made working with him fun. It isn’t everyday that you come across people who so naturally create a space that allows more creativity and motivation, without being limiting. I believe anyone would be happy to work with him.”
Dilip Palit “Mr. Pawan is a good leader to give positive direction in hotel industry. Wish him success in life.”
